Description: Book of the Dead of Ani; frame 26; forty-one columns of Hieratic text; yellow double-borders. Spell 78 continued.
Curator's comments: Tarasenko, Mykola. 2016. Studies on the vignettes from chapter 17 of the Book of the Dead. I, The image of mś.w Bdšt in ancient Egyptian mythology (Archaeopress Egyptology 16), Oxford, p. 100.
